name: Divinity Hunting
description:
This is a top-down large map world built with 2D elements.
Using a turn-based combat system, it is a game that focuses on strategic combat and character development.
It is based on the Chinese martial arts atmosphere. Because it is independently developed, many of the materials may not achieve the fairy tale atmosphere. Please forgive me.
The story line is that the protagonist leaves his hometown and goes to the world alone to find exercises and elixirs to become stronger.

1. Open world treasure hunt exploration
2. Flexible combination of various Kung Fu schools
3. Equipment system, which can collect herbs and elixirs
4. Multi difficulty challenges
